alert.note: Alert for Cochise; Pima; Santa Cruz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 19 at 6:05PM MST until August 19 at 6:45PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR WESTERN COCHISE, EAST CENTRAL PIMA AND NORTHEASTERN SANTA CRUZ COUNTIES... At 605 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated that thunderstorm had produced heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain has fallen from east of Elgin, north to along State Highway 82. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Huachuca City, Sonoita, Elgin, Fort Huachuca, Parker Canyon Lake and Canelo. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
